sense.gloss: to cry, to weep, to sob, to howl
crying one's eyes out (without making noise), breaking into a flood of tears, crying buckets, weeping
to shed tears, to be moved to tears
reluctantly, unwillingly, with a heavy heart
giving up in frustration, accepting meekly, being compelled to accept a situation
to make someone cry, to move someone to tears

sdata.j: お↑願↑↓ねが↓いだから↑泣↑↓な↓かないで。
さぁ↑笑↑↓わら↓って、↑泣↑↓な↓くのは↑後↑↓あと↓！
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑目↑↓め↓は↑泣↑↓な↓いて↑赤↑↓あか↓いよ。
sdata.e: Your eyes are red with crying.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がそんなに↑悲↑↓かな↓しそうに↑泣↑↓な↓くのは↑聞↑↓き↓いていられない。
sdata.e: I can't abide hearing you cry so bitterly.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓く↑事↑↓こと↓は↑悲↑↓かな↓しみの↑表現↑↓ひょうげん↓だ。
sdata.e: Crying is an expression of grief.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓くことは↑悲↑↓かな↓しみを↑和↑↓やわ↓らげる。
sdata.e: To weep is to make less the depth of grief.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓き↑寝入↑↓ねい↓りなんて↑嫌↑↓いや↓だ。
sdata.e: I can't let the matter drop.

words.gloss: to cry, to weep, to sob, to howl
